attributes.action: take action to ensure effective and fair dissemination of information regarding the EU and its activities
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The UK debate on the EU is mainly led by the tabloid press and is often heavily Eurosceptic, containing misleading statements and sometimes serious errors. There should be in this country an independent body commissioned with ensuring the availablity of accurate and impartial information regarding the EU, to allow for an informed debate. The Prime Minister should give considerastion to establishing such a service.
